website_summaries.verdict: A sleek and highly affordable ashtray that's perfect for indoor use. The lid keeps butts and unwanted smell at bay.
pros: Notable for the handy cigarette holder just inside the lid
The high-quality stainless steel design looks sleek and contemporary, but will fit most decor styles
Arrives in its own pouch, where it can be stored when not in use
cons: Users report the hinge pin can come loose and fall out

customer_reviews.title: I'm single again because of this ashtray.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my pothead boyfriend because he sits on my patio and gets ash everywhere. It's disgusting and makes my curtains, rugs and furniture stink. However, 2 days later he said he wanted to go smoke in his car, which I thought was weird since I bought him this fancy new ashtray. I went to check on him because it was getting late and I caught him doing the dirty with his "ex-employee" in his car. So, now my patio is ash free - thanks to this ashtray... It catches ash as well as cheating boyfriends - dual purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Anna

customer_reviews.title: The small size and light weight is an advantage for easy holding of ashtray in the palm.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly convenient ashtray, no ash and/or blown butts on my deck. Don't know why somebody complained about the opening by one hand - just hold a body between the thumb and middle finger and pull the bent near the hinge by the index finger. Holder for the cigarette is deep enough to sustain the wind. Yes, it's very light but this is an advantage - easy to hold in the palm when walking away from the table (it's California, you know, everybody wants to die in good health :)).
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It's an ash tray. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It's an ash tray. Solid construction, good materials. The door isn't a perfect fit, there's just a tiny bit of play, but it does the job. Easy to clean, I just dump it out, rinse it with rubbing alcohol and good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: These ashtrays are great! they are heavy duty and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These ashtrays are great! they are heavy duty and nice quality! I ordered two one for our front porch and one for our deck. They have a lid that closes so for those of us non-smokers we do not have to smell it or see it and it keeps the contents contained so it does not blow away. It also has a place to hold a cigarette securely if you need to set it down for a moment. We have received many compliments from guests that have used them and wanted to know where we got them! I would absolutely recommend these to others!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Van Hout

customer_reviews.title: Great ashtray to help conceal odor & mess!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband to use when traveling. It recently went with us to Sedona, AZ & is getting ready to go overseas with us. He wanted to try it out before our Sedona trip & he hasn't used anything besides it since then. He loves that the top lid flips down to help conceal the mess & odor & especially loves that the lid has an indentation that snugly holds the cigarette when you insert it, even in windy weather. He pops it in his pocket to go outside the hotels to smoke. Thinking of getting another so I can dedicate one of them to travels & leave the other at home (in the garage smoking area).
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Craig

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice ashtray. It was just what I needed. In reading other reviews a lot of them said that it does a good job keeping in the smell and that is absolutely true. Most people don't even realize that it is an ashtray which makes it even better. I would definitely repurchase and recommend this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Raene Roundtree

customer_reviews.title: Shiny Silver Used Ash & Filter Receptacle
customer_reviews.text: Well made quality product. Great for on the go or stay in place. Nice looking and functions as expected. Well designed and reliable cigarette holder built in. I would recommend buffing the outside with a clean cloth or napkin to keep the finish clean on a semi regular basis. Good purchase and conscientious company !
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Quality manufacturing!
customer_reviews.text: Not enough things are made worthy of talking about, yet this is the exception! It's nice to see the construction be so good and having something you're proud to own.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brady

customer_reviews.title: Small but fits a lot of cigarettes and great on the patio
customer_reviews.text: Small but fits a lot of cigarettes and great on the patio. Avoids having ashes flying all over the place. It fits in your hand but you can fit over 20 cigarette butts, which i wouldn't just because I hate the smell of a full ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Bermudanights

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to littering!
customer_reviews.text: There is NO smoking in my house so this is kept on the landing just outside the back door. Been in use for a few months now and so far it has been great. Hasn't been through a Midwest winter yet so I suppose this will be a true test of it's durability but if it doesn't make it out in great shape, I wouldn't hesitate to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and well-designed for the considerate smoker
customer_reviews.text: This small elegant ashtray arrives with a chic velvet sack. The grooved holder is ideal for those who multitask. The lid snaps tightly to conceal odors when you put out your cig. It has a nice weight--much heavier than you'd imagine for an item in this price range. The only issue I have is that it's not super easy to empty. The ashes get stuck under the rim--but a quick wipe with a paper towel solves that problem. I've purchased 2 so far. It's a perfect gift for your non-smoker friends to have on hand when you visit. The sticker you see on the front peels off--leaving you with a sleek silver orb.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t smoke in my house. Only outside, soI like to read at my picnic table and have my smoke out there. The problem with a standard ashtray is they look crappy, and the ashes blow all over the table. With this beauty, ashes stay in the deep cup, cigarette holder on the lid holds securely when I put it there and no unsightly butts on the table!!! Win, win, win!! I just ordered the larger size as a gift for my brother to use at his poolside for the guests that smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Jim The Pro Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a trip visiting non-smokers. It worked very well. Slip it back in the pouch and there is no residual odor. Very portable. Will be using again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Nono

customer_reviews.title: A personal ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on a whim, glad I did. The size is just right. It's about the size of the palm of your hand and maybe 2 inches high. I love the lid. It holds the odors, contains the embers, reduces fire risk. Can be used indoors or out. Easily hidden in a drawer when the in-laws come over. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: lacoursl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I waited to see how it endured an outdoor environment. A great choice for a small but not easily seen in the environment ashtray. Easy to move from one area to the next or for the occasional guest. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ashtray! Closes nicely and is attractive. We purchased more for outside deck area. No longer worried that lit cigarettes will blow and cause a fire. When closed no aweful ashtray smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product exceeded expectations . Update on free ashtray. Final update very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Love this ashtray I bought a for when my daughters who smoke visit. It is very nice and will look great in the entry porch . I am disappointed that the offer of a free ashtray tray didn’t work for me. I completed all requirements except I couldn’t get a snapshot of the review that I posted on Facebook. But I am very pleased with the ashtray. Update I was notified that my review was verified and I would receive the ashtray. I will update again when I receive it. So far good customer service. Got the free ashtray today. Love the ashtray and customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Classy. Quality. Buying another one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have several friends who smoke. They go outside. So it's outside on my patio table and it's a classy little thing! I love that it has a lid. Really a great design. Sturdy and very functional. I'm buying another one for my balcony upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura in Delray Beach

customer_reviews.title: Cool Deco retro ashtray....
customer_reviews.text: I love this....use it all the time ....keep it clean...looks trendy and sophisticated .....great gift....finish is chrome and done well....would buy again or gift if anyone smoked....although ot would be good for pot too i guess...nice pkg with card......5 star
customer_reviews.author: Stains and Smears

customer_reviews.title: My dad likes it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad because he smokes a lot. Usually, he would walk outside when he smokes, but even doing so won't prevent the odor to linger, and the ashes just make the ground insightful. I figure this would be a nice gift for him. It's stainless steel so it's easy to wash. I think my dad lines its inside with Aluminum foil for easy cleaning too. Very glad he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Nam T Than

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shiny Genuine Stainless Steel Good Quality ASHTRAY
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, heavy and sturdy, good looking, excellent quality ashtray - couldn't ask for more. Gave it as a gift to a smoker to use outside - read all the positive reviews and decided to give it a try. Worth every penny for $11.00 and change. Also arrived in a brown velvet drawstring pouch, which was a nice touch when presenting as a gift. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Fran K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tray!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ashtray! I'm a social smoker so to have something like an ashtray be on display has to look nice and this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great product - love it!
customer_reviews.text: This an example of something simply designed and functional. The products feature, style and design, speaks to how devices "can" be designed functionally (simple) and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Neely, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great item when having a guest that smokes
customer_reviews.text: I don't smoke but periodically have a guest over who does. They go outside and use any object they find to stamp out the end of the cigarette. Not cool. I bought this and so happy I did. The item is well made and much nicer than expected. I'm thinking about getting a couple more and giving them as gifts (let the smokers keep an ash tray with them). The label on the front is only a sticker which peels off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Love that you can keep it covered when not in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can keep it covered when not in use by just flipping the lid. Washes nice and clean in the dishwasher without leaving any ashy residue behind
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Lids come off
customer_reviews.text: We've had these ashtrays for a few months now. They are sturdy and look better than a regular ashtray. That's the only thing I can say good about these ashtrays. The lid came off the first one after we'd had them for only a few days. The lid just came off the second one today while I was emptying it and the pin fell in the garage can. So I feel the other one will eventually lose it's lid soon also. I should have listened to the other reviews but I did see good reviews too. I will not be purchasing any more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Durable, practical and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!! I picked the smaller version and it is perfect for our needs. We have guests visit our house who are smokers and it's so nice to be able to have a place for them to smoke and dump their butts that isn't our patio or grass. Plus, with the lid, we minimize the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid, shiny ashtray that looks great on a tabletop. Lid closure keeps the cigarette smell contained and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Another piece of Chinese crap! Very shiny. “We rippie OFFIR stupid Yankee with shiny!” Potentially US made steel stolen from us. Next to impossible to empty. Three or four bites + bunch of ashes always remain in Piece of junk rip off even if upside down shaking in over your head Attempting may be a chink ritual or something? The holder on the top broke off on the first day. Even with very gentle handling it’s a piece of crap, Buy only USA and return on Chinese crap at COD to anyone and delivers such junk to you now
customer_reviews.author: JOB

customer_reviews.title: Great Ashtray, Especially for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little ashtray! It came in a very pretty velvet bag so it would be easy to gift (if people gift things like this). It's true that it's a little difficult to shake all of the ashes out, but that's not the end of the world. What I like is, I keep my ashtray in my deck closet and don't empty it until the next day, and now when I open my closet, there's no smell. It holds the cigarette just fine, too. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary La Tourna

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a smoker, but bought this for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a smoker, but bought this for my room mate to make sure ashes were being disposed of and not just flicked on the driveway when they are out smoking. Figured it was more pro-active to give her a solution instead of complain about the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this ashtray at first, until I went to empty it. Difficult to empty completely because of the lip. And then the second time I emptied it, the pin fell out and into the trash can, along with the lid. I wasn't going to dig through my garbage to find the pin. So now I have an ashtray with no lid. Maybe try using super glue to keep the pin in. Pin doesn't need to move freely for the lid to open/close.
customer_reviews.author: PoopySox

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Quality Ash Tray
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sleek design, good weight to it. Lid opens and closes easily but not flimsy. It arrived quickly in a nice white box and with a brown velvet pouch to cover the ashtray. This would make a nice gift. You could probably take this and have it monogrammed for an added touch. I would recommend this ash tray. It does have a Life Warranty, the information is included with the shipment, just scan the barcode provided it’s that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia DeBenedetta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This ashtray is small but perfect for an outside patio. Its heavy for its size so won't be blown away with wind gusts. The lid smothers a ciggarett when lids closes. I am very happy with the product and the price was very inexpensive. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Pad58

customer_reviews.title: Think twice.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. It’s somewhat flimsy, the cap feels loose. The assembly must’ve been problematic because there’s what seems to be grind marks left on it. Kind of looks dirty when closed. Not that nice chrome-like look I was hoping for from the image. Definitely wouldn’t recommend it. I don’t think it’s worth more than a dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Primadonamama

customer_reviews.title: High quality product at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality ashtray and is exactly as described in terms of construction, functionality and visual appeal. The cigarette holder works perfectly, even when using hand-rolled cigarettes or tapered Raw cones. Although it's perfect "as is", it can be filled with ashtray sand to add extra weight and smoke odor reduction if desired. When the hinged lid is closed, it not only traps any lingering odors inside, but also makes its intended purpose less obvious for those wishing to leave it out in the open in a living room, den, etc. I would (and will) buy another one of these without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lehrbach

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the smaller one, which turned out to be exactly what I needed. I love the flip top. It has a holder, but it also seals up quite nicely. It's also quite an attractive piece, not something you would want to hide.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cotrupe

customer_reviews.title: Convenient & classy
customer_reviews.text: Of course, I always love the newness brand of excellent Stainless steel products. I have several of their products in my home. This Ashtray is so nice to have available for my special visitors who smoke, with the cigarette holder & nice lid. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: pistol patty

customer_reviews.title: Disguised ashtray
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to sit out on our deck and enjoy a cigar. This was the perfect ashtray to leave outside for his ashes. Nice looking with attached flip lid. Disguises the fact that it is an ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things clean in smoking areas.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, polished steel is plenty sturdy I’d say, and the lid makes it nice to not have to worry about the wind blowing a bunch of cigarette butts all over my backyard. Does exactly what I needed it to do, and wasn’t too expensive either. I might have to order a couple more of these to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Strutz

customer_reviews.title: Functions as it should
customer_reviews.text: This product did what it was intended to do. It’s a good functional ashtray. It’s a little small and when it gets rained on it is hard to clean, but otherwise it does what it’s purpose is. My one main issue is that it looks like a mini urn.... I’d like to find a discreet ashtray that would blend in with other items I have outdoors vs standing out and looking like an urn for a mouse haha
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn't stay closed or lock
customer_reviews.text: Lid doesn't stay closed, so it's not for travel. Unhappy with it but it was a last minute gift and didn't have time to do anything else. Cleans easy but for someone who needed something to keep in their wheelchair it not locking is unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Be Kind

customer_reviews.title: Nice QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, the packaging was very nice. The only downside is the inside lip is very sharp and can cut you if your not careful. If it wasn't for that i'd give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Platinum Team

customer_reviews.title: Nice lil Ashtray
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. A lot more durable than I thought it would be. I wish there was a snuffer inside to put out the cigarette, but I'll just use the holder on top.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my boyfriend who smokes way too much, he loves it and even if it falls off where it is there’s no mess! Such a beautiful and functional item
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Amazing. Lasted almost 6 years before the lid pin fell out, but the thing still looks like I bought it yesterday, after every day constant use. Washed it out with soap and water, weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to dump ciggarette
customer_reviews.text: used it for a day so far. Only thing I don't like about it is when it's time to dump the smokes out. They don't come out so easily. Other than that very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie C Helms

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact, practical gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for housemate so he had something small to hold ashes and butts while he smiled away from the house. Like the lid, hoping it will keep ash and smell down. He usually smokes half a cigarette so the holder came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Super gift for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect gift for my husband, he use to use a cup , so you can imagine how bad can looks and smell . BUT now with this new gift is the best , no smell at all and looks clean and nice . 👍
customer_reviews.author: Hellotampa

customer_reviews.title: Scratched and looks pre-used.
customer_reviews.text: As described, so far so good, but product arrived with scratches all over it. It actually has some staining around the cigarette holder on the lid... that makes it looks like it might have been used before. Probably worth the price but certainly not sold at the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty ashtray.
customer_reviews.text: This ashtray is really cute, I like that it has a place to hold your cigarette if you doing something while smoking. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P

customer_reviews.title: Returned it because the lid wasn't sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This round lidded ashtray is nice looking enough but I returned it because the lid was flimsy (as was the cigarette holder).
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy
customer_reviews.text: Could be five stars if feature holding cigarette is fixed so it doesn't slip off. Overall good buy for price. Attractive, quality, flips open easily and closes so it doesn't smell like dirty ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Lid will not stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece for sure. But i should have aked more questions. Just a word of advice. The lid does not snap or stay shut. I was hoping just to be able to throw it in a bag and bring it home to clean. The the lid opens right up when turned upside down.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Decent Ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Nice ashtray, lid does seem a little loose, wish it was harder to open I guess but will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin5732

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Liked this so much, I bought the car model. Very sturdy, well made and compact. Nice shiny finish and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Simple works
customer_reviews.text: Simple but works great kid is air tight so embers do go out quickly, like the silver look. Over all a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Joey coppertopp

customer_reviews.title: Study and nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, used it outdoors, no more buds on the floor. The cover makes it safe that it docent spill if toppled over.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Good ash tray. Looks small but the shape holds a lot in it. Has a lip around the edge so it's a little difficult to clean but still very usuable.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Smith

customer_reviews.title: A great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, has weight, a strong lid, nicely packaged, great find.
customer_reviews.author: D. Calahorro

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I love it. it's an excellent personal item and very sturdy. Great size for traveling. I plan on getting a couple more for just having about the house. Great service also.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky63

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for outside. Especially when wind blows.
customer_reviews.author: Debora S

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: Great little ashtray. Was hoping ut would keep the cigarette smell contained, but it does not. Works as described though
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Lid didn't close, but an easy return.
customer_reviews.text: The lid didn't come close to closing. It was a damage issue, it was just poorly built.
customer_reviews.author: MilesAway

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit heftier than expected, which was good because I had planned to keep it outside and didn't want it to blow over. The lid opens kind of weird (the handle is close to the hinge), but it's easy to get used to it. It seems to close well enough to smother any smoldering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, heavyweight ashtray for its overall size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy ashtray. I haven't really needed to clean it yet, but seems that it will be easy enough to clean. I thought the cover would snap securely closed but mine doesn't so it would probably spill in the bag provided unless you dumped it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Besares

customer_reviews.title: Nice, effective, not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and works great. The only downside is that tar easily collects on the lid and it's extremely difficult to clean because of the small hole.
customer_reviews.author: Lazserus

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky butts and ashes
customer_reviews.text: Great to have an ashtray with a lid so it puts out the cigarette when the lid is closed and eliminates the smoke. Kinda changed my life.
customer_reviews.author: Zombies8me

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Best ashtray ever! The lid puts the cigarette out when you are done and doesn’t leak smoke out so it is less smelly and looks so nice
customer_reviews.author: gene gelner

customer_reviews.title: It is very small and the top does not stay up
customer_reviews.text: Nice stainless steel astray. Too bad it didn't completely fix the problem. It is very small and the top does not stay up, you need both hands to open it. When upside down to empty not all comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Rixxy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stainless Steel ashtray! I like it’s durability and design. The fact that it has a lid that can hold your blunt or cigarette is very convenient. I also like the fact that the lid closes so that the ashes aren’t visible. I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kesha Green

customer_reviews.title: Too wide to fit in a car's cup holder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the car for smokers who travel with me. Works great to close off smoke/ash odors. My complaint is that it is just too big to fit in a cup holder between the front seat, so it tips easily.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ashtray! I recently redid my outdoor area and this ashtray looks great. It's so pretty that when I had visitors over, they didn't even realize that it was an ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Needham

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product...love that it suffocates the hot ash..highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dan Schwent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ashtray. Good size to hold many ashes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ashtray. Good size to hold many ashes, yet not large, due to it's being a bit tall and thin stainless steel. It is a modern and sleek looking ashtray and it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: N. Carothers

customer_reviews.title: Giftable
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a very nice velvet bag, giftable. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: LaboriPonceña23

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Love it! If we must have them in the house. They must be aligned with my style. They are durable and work exactly as described. I’ll be ordering more for gifts
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Tee

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a gift and he absolutely loved it! It does not look like an ash tray and the lid keeps the smell out. Our guests used to have to throw out their cigarettes in the yard, but not anymore. Can’t go wrong with the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, nice material. Like that the lid flips open to a little holder for your joint/Cig. Was packaged very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Grindstaff

customer_reviews.title: NIce-looking and compact
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my smoker friends as I was tired of picking up butts after parties. Was looking for an ashtray that looked nice, would protect against wind gusts blowing away the ashes, and was compact and easily stored. This one met all of my needs and for a great price! Would recommend. The middle comes out for easy cleanup as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Marks

customer_reviews.title: Best Ashtray I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This ashtray is the bomb, like tick tick. It looks cool and is extremely functional. It conceals odors, and has a nice little resting spot on the top, and it easy to clean (I just use hot water *shrugs*). I get compliments every time someone new uses it. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: OGmarissa

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, but it's not very big
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, but it's not very big. I wish I had gotten a bigger one. My husband uses it outside to smoke. It's nice because it has a lid so you can't smell the ashtray unless you're sitting right next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McGee

customer_reviews.title: It really is pretty sleek - as far as ashtrays go
customer_reviews.text: What's interesting about this ashtray is that people think it's from the 20's or 30's and want to know what antique store I found it. It really is pretty sleek - as far as ashtrays go.
customer_reviews.author: Gisele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! We have 4 in our house and we put them dish washer and they come out very clean every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Nice to give as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My big sister enjoyed this. Very nice to give as a gift for a smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Practical Ash Tray
customer_reviews.text: This is a great functional and discreet ash tray. I really like being able to hide all the ash away, it keeps things cleaner looking and helps cover the smells up. The cigarette holder on the reverse side of the lid is a very welcome addition as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Its a good ashtray. The only thing i dont like is there is no spot to roll the cherry of my spliff to get the extra ash off
customer_reviews.author: Justin Decatur

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: It a really nice looking product. It's not just an ashtray when you put it on your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Qinting Chen

customer_reviews.title: Better than Anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised by the quality of this ash tray. I anticipated thr hinge that allows it to be closed would have broken by now and /or the ashtray would have rusted somewhere. But neither has occurred and I use it on a regular basis. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: The Best Ashtray You Will Ever Buy! The problem of messy stinky ashtrays has been solved. This looks great whether open or closed. Closed, it is an attractive silver bowl. Open, it has a holder to keep your cigarette (or cigar) in place
customer_reviews.author: G3

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good little ashtray. Lid doesn’t stay closed but a little Velcro tape fixed that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this very durable nice quality perfect for outside
customer_reviews.author: Debra mckee

customer_reviews.title: No more ashes on my deck!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he loves it. I’m not a smoker, but I love how it blends in with my decor and looks cute sitting on the table. The real reason I bought it though, no more ashes on my deck!
customer_reviews.author: Patti VanHuizen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and I expected it to be mediocre at best but it has far surpassed that. The quality is amazing and it comes in a little fuzzy bag (think crown royal). Definitely need to get one for myself and will be ordering more for friends in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint is that it's a little difficult to empty.
customer_reviews.author: CheeseheadED

customer_reviews.title: Interesting item.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my dad and regret giving it as I am trying to get him to quit smoking not promote it.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Chacherine

customer_reviews.title: Holds his cigarette and hides it after done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bf he loves it holds his 🚬 and hides after done easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Totally removed the smell from the patio. Simple looking but sharp looking. Great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and effective
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and effective Ash tray. You can display it on your table and it looks good with any decor. When you close it your cigars/cigarettes are extinguished immediately with no lingering smell or smoke.
customer_reviews.author: E.D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great function, design flaw
customer_reviews.text: great build quality, however, there is a design flaw that i've noticed that another reviewer had mentioned. the cigarette holder attached to the lid does sit back a bit further than ideal for the ash to drop into the tray when the cigarette is nearly finished. but other than that, its great.
customer_reviews.author: Cvo

product_meta.title: Newness Ashtray, Stainless Steel Modern Tabletop Ashtray with Lid, Cigarette Ashtray for Indoor or Outdoor Use, Ash Holder for Smokers, Desktop Smoking Ash Tray for Home Office Decoration
feature_bullets: Made of stainless steel, modern design, easy to clean
Easy to carry, suitable for outdoor or indoor
A beautiful art decoration for your desktop
Narrow opening for windproof. A cigarette holder welded to the inside of the lid that is very convenient
